fields.title: COURSE SUPER
fields.description: The Super Course is created for learners who want to move beyond everyday communication and start speaking more naturally and independently...
fields.content_html: Super Course Details Dive deep into structured conversation and advanced vocabulary building...

fields.title: COURSE HIGH
fields.description: The High Course is focused on achieving fluency and mastery over complex academic and professional language...
fields.content_html: High Course Details Master sophisticated grammar structures and idiomatic expressions...

fields.title: COURSE MIDDLE
fields.description: The Middle Course is designed for foundational learners to build confidence in everyday conversations and basic grammar...
fields.content_html:
Middle Course Details

Focuses on core verbs, simple tense usage, and common situational phrases...

fields.title: COURSE EXPERT
fields.description: The Expert Course provides intense practice in specialized domain language, public speaking, and critical analysis...
fields.content_html:
Expert Course Details

Prepares students for international examinations and high-level professional communication...

fields.comment: The Super Course significantly boosted my speaking confidence!
Great content for beginners. Highly recommend the Middle Course.
